weko_file_added: ${user} added draft file ${filename} to JAIRO Cloud index ${dataset} in ${node}
weko_file_removed: ${user} removed draft file ${filename} from JAIRO Cloud index ${dataset} in ${node}
weko_folder_created: ${user} created draft folder ${filename} in JAIRO Cloud index ${dataset} in ${node}
weko_item_deposited: ${user} deposit item ${path} in JAIRO Cloud index ${dataset} in ${node}
weko_node_authorized: ${user} authorized the JAIRO Cloud addon for ${node}
weko_node_deauthorized: ${user} deauthorized the JAIRO Cloud addon for ${node}
